DJGPP Notes

DJGPP Configure and Build

Since DJGPP is not supported by CMake it has an independent build system which is documented at sys/dos/djgpp/readme. The eventual plan is to incorporate that material into this documentation, but we haven't done it yet so this section NEEDS DOCUMENTATION.
